content: आध्मात {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Puffed up, inflated, elated, filled with (<ab>lit.</ab> and <ab>fig.</ab>). charged with; पापेनेवाध्मातमूर्तयः <ls>K. 107</ls>; <ls>Dk. 110</ls>; मिथ्याध्मात <ls>Mv. 3. 28</ls>; <ls n="Mv.">6. 30</ls>; <ls>Mk. 9. 12</ls>; अमृत° <ls>U. 6. 21</ls>, <ls>Mk. 5. 22</ls>; भर° हृदयः <ls>U. 1. 29</ls>; दर्प° filled with pride. {@--2@} Excessively affected, increased, magnified; <ls>U. 5. 6</ls>; <ls>Mk. 5. 18.</ls> {@--3@} Sounded, sounding. {@--4@} Burnt. {@--5@} Sick by the swelling of the belly. --तः {@--1@} Flatulence, swelling of the abdomen with noise. {@--2@} War, battle.
